task.title: How to Create an Account
task.shortdesc: Thank you for your interest in AirClassroom! Let's create your account.

step.cmd: Click "Sign Up" in the top right corner.
Enter your information into the appropriate fields.
step.info: You will not be able to use the same email address for two different accounts.

step.cmd: Upload a profile picture that shows your face.
See to make your first reservation.
